text: Ta te dhuwa jolai kene aradhana kori bole laga suna pora bona pobitro bedi thakise. Etu laga bhitor te vachan laga sandook thakise kuntu suna pora pura lipai kene thakise. Etu laga bhitor te suna pora bona kolsi ekta te manna rakhi thakise, aru Aaron laga lathi pora notun pata ulaikene thakise, aru vachan likhi rakha pathor, eitu khan sob halikena thakise9.4 Exo. 16:33; 25:10-16; 30:1-6; Num. 17:8-10; Deu. 10:3,5..
